page.title: 05W.CHILT'TON NYETIMBER FARM
page.content: {Nyetimber}was mentioned in the first{Domesday Book.}In the Great Hall is a fireplace big enough to fit two couches. The Great Hall used to be a dairy.The dining room used to be the kitchen. It still has the Bread Oven and the paddle shaped peel for getting the bread out. Only one room in the house has no beams or brickwork that can be seen,no-one knows why. We went out through the large Oak front door, twice the normal size.In the courtyard is the grave of someone. { Nyetimber Farm}has a{pig unit}with 24 sows,2 boars and 90 piglets. The piglets take 3months 3weeks 3days to be born from the time of mating. There are about 10 or 12 piglets in each litter and 2 or 3 litters each year. The pigs live in a barn over 300 years old. It has a steep roof so we think it used to be thatched.
